original_text: The land went from Halak mountain near Edom country, to Baal Gad in the Lebanon valley, below Hermon mountain. He caught all the kings of those regions and he killed them all.
korean_text: 곧 세일로 올라가는 할락 산에서부터 헤르몬 산 아래 레바논 골짜기의 바알갓까지라 그들의 왕들을 모두 잡아 쳐죽였으며

sentences.original_text: The land went from Halak mountain
to Baal Gad in the Lebanon valley
He caught all the kings of those regions
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 지역들의 모든 왕들을 잡았으며
